Detailed Description

Class for getting input spikes from a file.

This class abstract methods for getting the input spikes to the network.

Author:
Jesus Garrido

Richard Carrillo

Date:
August 2008

void FileInputSpikeDriver::LoadInputs ( EventQueue *  Queue,
Network *  Net 
) throw (EDLUTFileException) [virtual]

It introduces the input activity in the simulation event queue from the file.

This method introduces the cumulated input activity in the simulation event queue.

Parameters:
Queue The event queue where the input spikes are inserted.
Net The network associated to the input spikes.
Exceptions:
EDLUTException If something wrong happens in the input process.
